Abortion.definition: the termination of a pregnancy after
Abortion.origin: [a conspiracy to commit "W. R. LaFave and A. W. Scott, Jr."]

1.definition: the termination of a pregnancy after, accompanied by, or closely followed by the death of the embryo or fetusthe medical procedure of inducing expulsion of a human fetus to terminate a pregnancy

2.definition: the crime of procuring or performing an illegal abortion [a conspiracy to commit "W. R. LaFave and A. W. Scott, Jr."] see alsoandin the Important Cases section
